synopsis.text: Takashi Miike, the renowned director, teams up with animation studio Sublimation to bring CAPCOM's iconic Sengoku era game, ONIMUSHA, to life in an action-packed anime series. The legendary swordsman, Miyamoto Musashi, modeled after the late, prolific actor Toshiro Mifune, embarks on a secretive quest during the early Edo Period, a time when Japan was transitioning towards peace. Armed with the mythical 'Oni Gauntlet,' a weapon with a demonic appetite for souls, the aging Musashi sets out on a perilous journey to eradicate the bloodthirsty Genma demons plaguing the land. Joined by a samurai brotherhood, Musashi must confront the undead uprising and restore peace to a poverty-stricken nation. Witness the blade of Musashi slice through evil in this intense, realistic action series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
